009package imagingbook.common.geometry.moments;
010
011import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
012import imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic;
013
014
015/**
016 * <p>
017 * This class defines methods for statistical moment calculations on 2D point
018 * sets. See Sec. 8.5 of [1] for details. This abstract class defines static
019 * methods only.
020 * </p>
021 * <p>
022 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
023 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
024 * </p>
025 * 
026 * @author WB
027 * @version 2022/11/17
028 */
029public abstract class Moments2D {       //TODO: make more efficient versions!
030        
031        private Moments2D() {}
032        
033        /**
034         * Calculates and returns the ordinary moment of order (p,q) for the
035         * specified set of 2D points.
036         * 
037         * @param points a set of 2D points
038         * @param p order index p
039         * @param q order index q
040         * @return the moment value
041         */
042        public static double ordinaryMoment(Iterable<Pnt2d> points, int p, int q) {
043                double mpq = 0.0;
044                if (p == 0 && q == 0) { // just count the number of points
045                        for (@SuppressWarnings("unused") Pnt2d pnt : points) {
046                                mpq += 1;
047                        }
048                }
049                else {
050                        for (Pnt2d pnt : points) {
051                                mpq += Math.pow(pnt.getX(), p) * Math.pow(pnt.getY(), q);
052                        }
053                }
054                return mpq;
055        }
056
057        /**
058         * Calculates and returns the central moment of order (p,q) for the
059         * specified set of 2D points.
060         * 
061         * @param points a set of 2D points
062         * @param p order index p
063         * @param q order index q
064         * @return the moment value
065         */
066        public static double centralMoment(Iterable<Pnt2d> points, int p, int q) {
067                double m00 = ordinaryMoment(points, 0, 0); // region area
068                if (Arithmetic.isZero(m00)) {
069                        throw new RuntimeException("empty point set");
070                }
071                double xc = ordinaryMoment(points, 1, 0) / m00;
072                double yc = ordinaryMoment(points, 0, 1) / m00;
073                double mupq = 0.0;
074                for (Pnt2d pnt : points) {
075                        mupq += Math.pow(pnt.getX() - xc, p) * Math.pow(pnt.getY() - yc, q);
076                }
077                return mupq;
078        }
079
080        /**
081         * Calculates and returns the normalized central moment of order (p,q) for the
082         * specified set of 2D points.
083         * 
084         * @param points a set of 2D points
085         * @param p order index p
086         * @param q order index q
087         * @return the moment value
088         */
089        public static double normalizedCentralMoment(Iterable<Pnt2d> points, int p, int q) {
090                double m00 = ordinaryMoment(points, 0, 0);
091                double scale = 1.0 / Math.pow(m00, 0.5 * (p + q) + 1);
092                return scale * centralMoment(points, p, q);
093        }
094
095}
096
